testcase.classname: US_002 System should not allow anyone to register with invalid credentials
testcase.name: TC_001 Any field on the registration page should not be left blank
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to GMi Bank Homepage........................................passed And User clicks the "Register" from dropdown menu...........................passed And User enter anything to SSN text box and presses the enter key...........passed Then User should see the SSN error message "enter_ssn_message" message......passed
